description: Split hero with photo and art deco decorative accents

fields.name: Subtitle
fields.default: Welcome To My Online Writing Sanctuary

fields.name: Description
fields.default: Have a seat right here next to me, on the chair if the floor is bad for your knees. Let’s talk about everything, plans, ideas and dreams, firm-to-shaky faiths and hard realities; this is the stuff that makes us human, after all. I’ve chewed my cuticles down thinking about my own doubts, so you know yours are safe here with me! Let’s go deep. I’m so glad you’re here.
